metadata.title: CVE-2023-50268 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: jq is a command-line JSON processor. Version 1.7 is vulnerable tostack-based buffer overflow in builds using decNumber. Version 1.7.1contains a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: jq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
